price: 98. Oyo akozala monguna na Allah, mpe ba anzelu naye, mpe batindami naye, mpe Djibril na Mîkâl, mpe ya sôló Allah azali monguna ya bapengwi.
arabic: مَن كَانَ عَدُوّٗا لِّلَّهِ وَمَلَٰٓئِكَتِهِۦ وَرُسُلِهِۦ وَجِبۡرِيلَ وَمِيكَىٰلَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَدُوّٞ لِّلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: man kāna ʿaduwwan lillahi wamalāikatihi warusulihi wajib'rīla wamīkāla fa-inna al-laha ʿaduwwun lil'kāfirīna
